channel.title: Content outreach podcast
channel.description:
Hey guys. I'm not sure if you're into this goodlinks thing. The last couple posts were pretty much radio silence.
I'll stop posting on it if it's not interesting to you guys at all.
I launched a podcast where we talk about outreach strategies.
Might be useful for y'all bootstrappers trying to get traction for your stuff.
http://podcast.goodlinks.io (Audio quality isn't amazing. Will improve)
Just recorded two new eps today.
P.s. I'm sharing income transparently as well. I just hit 2k MRR today on day 15 of the business! http://blog.goodlinks.io/income-expense-report-jan-2016/
(Sent from phone)

item.title: Content outreach podcast
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Sounds amazing man. I probably will have a hard time coming out to SF but if you want to swing by my hood I will roll out the Monrovia welcome mat for you and take you out for lunch! You can book time on my calendar - https://calendly.com/kalenjordan

Read full topic

item.title: Content outreach podcast
item.dc:creator: pjc
item.description:
Yeah. Can hardly follow with support / requests / bugs right now, and apps keep growing fast without any marketing. At this point adding another platform would be suicide.

Appreciate the word of mouth though!

P.S. I’ll be in SF end of March for Shopify Unite. Let me know if you want to have a drink.

Read full topic

item.title: Content outreach podcast
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Cool :). Hey bud! Yeah it is kind of surprising. I think productized services are likely always going to grow faster. Trick is going to be seeing if we can really scale this.

Oh and by the way, I was talking to a customer recently about how much they hated yo**po. I mentioned your app but they are on Magento so I know you’re probably not gonna move there any time soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Content outreach podcast
item.dc:creator: pjc
item.description:
I did listen to the first podcast. Interesting how fast this business grows.

item.title: Content outreach podcast
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Hey guys. I’m not sure if you’re into this goodlinks thing. The last couple posts were pretty much radio silence.

I’ll stop posting on it if it’s not interesting to you guys at all.

I launched a podcast where we talk about outreach strategies.

Might be useful for y’all bootstrappers trying to get traction for your stuff.

Pigzilla

Pigzilla | Local SEO for Single, Multi-Location & Service Area Businesses

I design customized local SEO programs that are built around business goals with a focus on ROI.


(Audio quality isn’t amazing. Will improve)

Just recorded two new eps today.

P.s. I’m sharing income transparently as well. I just hit 2k MRR today on day 15 of the business!
http://blog.goodlinks.io/income-expense-report-jan-2016/

(Sent from phone)
